pageContext.claim: “We're preserving our land. We're making our land better and cleaner and safer.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump describes climate change as a hoax, withdrew the United States from the Paris climate accord, has touched off a wave of environmental deregulation, falsely claims wind turbines cause cancer, and continually cheers and advocates for fossil fuel production and consumption. He also has allowed oil drilling in areas that were once nature preserves. This bill is a very small dent in his troubled environmental legacy.
